title: 95/65/EC: Commission Decision of 7 March 1995 extending the period referred to in Article 15 (2a) of Council Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 7 March 1995 extending the period referred to in Article 15 (2a) of Council Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes (95/65/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 15 (2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC, '31 March 1994' is replaced by '31 March 1995'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66.
(2) OJ No L 319, 21. 12. 1993, p. 39.
(3) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(4) OJ No L 92, 9. 4. 1994, p. 27.
(5) OJ No L 317, 18. 12. 1993, p. 75.
(6) OJ No L 21, 28. 1. 1995, p. 18.
